This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness report from Report form #1 - General Sighting Cases "I walked out of the house with a couple of friends to their car. As they were entering [their] car, 2 very bright red [orbs] came slowly from the WNW to the ESE, from my left side. I pointed up at them and said "UFO's" to my friends but because of the cold weather (approx. 32��� F). They did not look. Thinking I was joking, perhaps. They drove away without looking. When reports came out in the newspapers my friend called me on the phone to ask what I had seen. They [the objects] made no noise. There was no sign of heat waves. They were very stable objects even though there was a 20-30 MPH wind, as there was a norther blowing in at the time."
